operator.name: R Snippet
operator.synopsis: Allows to locallay run r-scripts against a given input
operator.help: This operator will make its input available in R (either running locally or remotely) and expose the results at its output. TODO continue this...

operator.name: Open In R
operator.synopsis: Creates a temporary workspace file for the input and opens a new R-Gui instance for it
operator.help: Creates a temporary workspace file for the input and opens a new R-Gui instance for it. TODO continue this...

operator.name: R Plot
operator.synopsis: Creates an r-plot and show it.

operator.name: R Screen Lattice
operator.synopsis: Creates a lattice of plot of a singel parameter of a screen
